name: web-pdm
description: 一个用G6做的ER图工具，最终目标是想做成在线版的 powerdesigner

scripts.build: rm -rf public &&  NODE_ENV=production webpack --config ./webconfig.config.js --mode production  --colors --max_old_space_size=1024 && rm -rf docker/public  && cp -r ./public docker/public
scripts.publish-npm: npm run changelog && git commit -am 'docs: update changelog' && npm run build-lib ; npm version prerelease && npm publish --registry=http://registry.npmjs.org && cnpm sync web-pdm
scripts.publish-npm:patch: npm run build-lib ; npm version patch && npm publish --registry=http://registry.npmjs.org && cnpm sync web-pdm
scripts.build-lib: npm run copy && npm run tsc
scripts.copy: rm -rf es && mkdir es && cp -R src/* es && find es -name '*.ts' | xargs rm -f && find es -name '*.tsx' | xargs rm -f
scripts.tsc: tsc src/*.js src/*.tsx  src/**/*.tsx  --allowSyntheticDefaultImports true -d --lib es6,dom --experimentalDecorators true -t es6 --moduleResolution node --jsx react --outDir es --allowJs true

author: 北名
